templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.ccvideo.com/deals

templates.name: Catalog Request
templates.content:
You can request a print catalog from us by visiting https://www.ccvideo.com/catalog/requestprintcatalog. Just fill out the form, and we'll send you a catalog featuring all our products. 

If you need help with anything else or have any questions, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you!

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.ccvideo.com/help

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at cs@ccvideo.com. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We don't currently offer free shipping, but all promos will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: I can check if that's possible. What's the order number, email address and the change you'd like to make?

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at cs@ccvideo.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out the items we have on sale here: https://www.ccvideo.com/deals

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at cs@ccvideo.com.. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We usually ship via USPS and once shipped it will take 3-10 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content:
You can give us a call at 630-919-2246 Monday - Friday, 8am - 7pm &
Saturday 9am - 5pm CT, or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/criticschoicevideo/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/CriticsChoiceVideo
